samples.question: What kinds of buildings are considered unusual in Usbekistan?
samples.transcript: I would say historical buildings are very unusual in our country. and they are actually pretty well preserved some of them. We can give Registan a squareistan in summer as an example. it is very unusual and it is quite amazing to enjoy and you know look at.

samples.question: >> Do you think the design of a building is more important than its function?
samples.transcript: >> I would not say so. that is a good question. I think a building should serve some purpose and it is actually more important than the design itself. For example, you might have a very small building which is not welldesigned but it if it serves the right purpose, if it functions as a learning center, let us say, and it does a pretty well job, produces results, this building will be more memorable for the students. >> Okay.
samples.transcript_original: >> I wouldn't say so. That's a good question. I think uh a building should serve some purpose and it's actually more important than the design itself. samples.question: Why do some people prefer modern architecture while others prefer traditional styles?
samples.transcript: >> I mean, it all comes down to exposure to social media. I guess you look at the social media videos where people are living this lavish lifestyles in Dubai with modern architecture and you get inspired and also want to have this you know visit this kind of places and own this kind of buildings and etc. But I would say like history enthusiasts would actually prefer to you know look at historical architecture. >> Okay.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 3]
samples.transcript: In charge in charge complained about my poor performance in front of my parents and also she she complained about my bad behavior in the class because i used to bunk my classes my parents were very disappointed with me at that time they were staring at me with the angry gestures my head was low with the shame and i was feeling very uncomfortable at that time so i decided to overcome my embarrassment by promising my parents to work hard in next year and i did the same also my parents encouraged me as well as my class in charge in charge also encouraged me and i strained my every nerve in order to get good results in next standard and in a 10th standard i i was passed out with the flying colors my parents were extremely glad at that time not only my parents but i was also over the moon because i was able to fulfill my promise so this is all about a time okay can i take that back please yes yes let me ask you some more question how well respected our teachers in your society well teachers in my society are very well respected and everyone respect them because a teacher job is considered as foundation of all other jobs also they encourage children motivate them and guide them in order to make them a good citizen do you think teachers get paid enough money in your country well if i talk about teachers in government schools and colleges then they enjoy handsome salaries but if i talk about teachers who engaged in private schools and colleges then their salary is not enough as compared to governments jobs what role should the teacher have in the classroom well teachers plays.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 4]

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 2]
samples.transcript: Fan of you know fast food and sweets and he would eat them almost every day so as you can probably guess he started to have a spare tire around his stomach so he had a really hard touch using clothes that fit his body and that ourselves have that also had an adverse effect on his health I mean he got exhausted and lost his concentration very easily while studying and working because we were best friend you know we go way back so I was willing to share with him some of my thoughts I suggested him a few things in order for him to check some pounds such as following a healthy diet which includes mostly veggies and lean meat I also encouraged him to take to hit the gym on a regular basis to build muscles and burn calories and of course it was a little bit hesitant at first but eventually he decided to follow my advice and to my surprise after just two years he was able to lose 10 pounds it was nothing short of amazing he later revealed to me that he asked for my opinions because he had deep trust in me and I took a lot of pride in it as for him he has become a much more health conscious person and has a very healthy lifestyle hopefully we will be able to help each other more often in the future all right.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 1]
samples.transcript: Which do you prefer living in the city or only visiting them is a tourist well i believe that when it comes to some distant regions it is not suitable for me to have a stable life there so i just visit them as a tourist to cultivate my sense of knowledge as well as experience about their fascinating cultures and exclusive traditions however if i have a chance to go to some metropolitan cities such as sydney or new york i suppose that i want to settle down in those places since the economy and the welfare system of those areas are really up to standard so i can further my professional career or obtain the financial abundance to upgrade my life quality second question how do young children react when they go to school for the first time i think it is based on the personalities of a child you know some children are vigorous and energetic so they love to lose themselves in new environments like school for example to discover new conditions and make new acquaintances without any hesitation by contrast other children can be introverted and quiet so when they go to new schools they have to say goodbye to their parents which sometimes dampens their spirits and arouses their sense of apprehension third question how do young and old people react differently to new things you know I am not sure about this but i think there is a significant difference between the way young and old people react to new challenges and things you know young people are widely perceived to be full of enthusiasm so whenever they dive into new challenges they can cultivate a sense of excitement and contentment by contrast the ages tend to have weak physical performance so trying new.

samples.question: Can you tell me where you are from?
samples.transcript: >> I am from London in the United Kingdom. it is a big city with a lot of history.
samples.transcript_original: >> I'm from London in the United Kingdom. It's a big city with a lot of history.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> I am from London in the United Kingdom. it is a big city with a lot of history.

samples.question: >> What do you like the most about living there?
samples.transcript: >> Well, I really love the cultural diversity. There are so many different kinds of food and festivals. it is very lively. that is interesting.
samples.transcript_original: >> Well, I really love the cultural diversity. There are so many different kinds of food and festivals. It's very lively. That's interesting.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> Well, I really love the cultural diversity. There are so many different kinds of food and festivals. it is very lively. that is interesting.

samples.question: How long have you lived there?
samples.transcript: >> I have lived there my whole life, which is about 25 years now.
samples.transcript_original: >> I have lived there my whole life, which is about 25 years now.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> I have lived there my whole life, which is about 25 years now.

samples.question: >> Do you think you will continue living there in the future?
samples.transcript: >> I hope so. I mean, it is my home. I enjoy it, but sometimes I think about living somewhere else just to experience a different lifestyle.
samples.transcript_original: >> I hope so. I mean, it's my home. I enjoy it, but sometimes I think about living somewhere else just to experience a different lifestyle.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> I hope so. I mean, it is my home. I enjoy it, but sometimes I think about living somewhere else just to experience a different lifestyle.

samples.question: >> What kind of place would you like to move to?
samples.transcript: >> Maybe somewhere quieter or with more nature, like the countryside. I think it would be refreshing. >>.
samples.transcript_original: >> Maybe somewhere quieter or with more nature, like the countryside. I think it would be refreshing. >>.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> Maybe somewhere quieter or with more nature, like the countryside. I think it would be refreshing. >>.
